org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hoverable

    public class Image
extends UiElement
    Wraps a Texture or TextureRegion as a UiElement
